      • SimilarityCalculator

        protected SimilarityCalculator(java.lang.String srcLang,
                    java.lang.String trgLang,
                    RepresentationType type,
                    Model simModel)
        Creates a similarity calculator with the given arguments and n=1 for the n-grams methods.
        Parameters:
        srcLang - Source language
        trgLang - Target language
        type - Type of representation needed by the calculator
        simModel - Type of similarity model needed by the calculator.

      • SimilarityCalculator

        public SimilarityCalculator(java.lang.String srcLang,
                    java.lang.String trgLang,
                    RepresentationType type,
                    Model simModel,
                    int nGrams)
        Creates a similarity calculator with the given arguments.
        Parameters:
        srcLang - Source language
        trgLang - Target language
        type - Type of representation needed by the calculator
        simModel - Type of similarity model needed by the calculator.
        nGrams - The value of N for the representations which uses n-grams

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static SimilarityCalculator getInstance(java.lang.String src,
                               java.lang.String trg,
                               Similarity method)
        Returns the suitable calculator according to the given similarity method. In case that the desired method uses n-grams, the value of N will be 1.
        Parameters:
        method - The desired method.
        Returns:
        The full implemented calculator which is able to calculate the desired method.

      • getInstance

        public static SimilarityCalculator getInstance(java.lang.String src,
                               java.lang.String trg,
                               Similarity method,
                               int nGrams)
        Returns the suitable calculator according to the given similarity method. In case that the desired method uses n-grams, the value of N will be the indicated by nGrams.
        Parameters:
        method - The desired method.
        nGrams - The value of n for the n-grams, if it's needed.
        Returns:
        The full implemented calculator which is able to calculate the desired method. A null object is retourned if the method is unknown.

      • calculate

        public SimilarityMatrix calculate(java.io.File src,
                         java.io.File trg)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Calculates the matrix of similarities for the given files.
        Parameters:
        src - File which contains the source article
        trg - File which contains the target article
        Returns:
        The matrix of similarities
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        protected SimilarityMatrix calculateSimilarityMatrix()

        Returns:
